alert.note: Alert for Labette; Montgomery (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 2:26AM CDT until July 13 at 3:30AM CDT by NWS Wichita
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wichita has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Labette County in southeastern Kansas... Southeastern Montgomery County in southeastern Kansas... * Until 330 AM CDT. * At 225 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Altamont, moving southeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Coffeyville, Oswego, Chetopa, Altamont, Edna, Liberty, Bartlett, Angola and Coffeyville Airport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
